Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.gui

Class GuiTextureManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.gui.GuiTextureManager
public class GuiTextureManager extends Object
Manages GUI textures for cards, resources, and other game elements.

    • GuiTextureManager

      private GuiTextureManager()
      Private constructor for singleton pattern. Initializes all texture maps and loads images.

  • Method Details

    • loadCard

      private GuiTexture loadCard(int id)
      Loads a card texture based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The card ID.
      Returns:
      GuiTexture containing both front and back images.

    • loadCardBack

      private javafx.scene.image.Image loadCardBack(Resource resource, boolean isGold)
      Loads the back image of a card based on the resource type and whether it is a gold card.
      Parameters:
      resource - The resource type.
      isGold - Whether the card is a gold card.
      Returns:
      Image of the card back.

    • getCardImage

      public javafx.scene.image.Image getCardImage(int id, boolean flipped)
      Retrieves the image of a card by its ID and orientation.
      Parameters:
      id - The card ID.
      flipped - Whether the card is flipped (showing the back).
      Returns:
      The requested card image.

    • getCardImageByVirtualCard

      public javafx.scene.image.Image getCardImageByVirtualCard(VirtualCard virtualCard)
      Retrieves the image of a card based on a VirtualCard object.
      Parameters:
      virtualCard - The virtual card.
      Returns:
      The image of the card.

    • getCardBackByResource

      Retrieves the back image of a card based on the resource type and whether it is a gold card.
      Parameters:
      resource - The resource type.
      isGold - Whether the card is a gold card.
      Returns:
      The back image of the card.
